testTypes.description: Tests individual components or functions in isolation to ensure they work correctly.
Verifies that different components or systems work together properly.
Evaluates the system's compliance with specified functional requirements and behaviors.
Tests the entire system as a whole to ensure it meets all specified requirements.
Determines if the system satisfies acceptance criteria and is ready for delivery.
Assesses the system's speed, responsiveness, and stability under various load conditions.
Quick, surface-level tests to ensure basic functionality before more thorough testing.
Verifies that recent changes haven't adversely affected existing functionality.
Identifies vulnerabilities and ensures the system is protected against potential threats.
Evaluates the user-friendliness and overall user experience of the system.
